segments.text: I see the water just pouring out of the sink, creating a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's disgusting how the woman doesn't notice it at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit annoyed watching this happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, drying that plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's ever going to look down and see the disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just cascading down the cabinets, making everything wet and slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should really tell her what's going on before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn't slip and hurt herself in all this water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and she's completely oblivious to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm watching a train wreck in slow motion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is quite a sight, so much water and she's missing it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
